attributes.action: Demand a General Election to Break the Brexit impass.
attributes.background:
The Government has time and again failed to deliver any credible Brexit options and MPs are more interested in protection or advancing their political careers.

Our political system is in gridlock and domestic politics has stalled completely.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235547

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
